== I'm having trouble logging in. What can I do? ==
You can use https://login.ubuntu.com/ to test which email addresses have accounts, recover your password, and otherwise fix most login issues.

Please also check the <nowiki>[[SSO|Ubuntu Single Sign-On login service FAQ]]</nowiki> for more help.
